metadata.title: CVE-2020-13566 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: SQL injection vulnerabilities exist in phpGACL 3.3.7. A specially craftedHTTP request can lead to a SQL injection. An attacker can send an HTTPrequest to trigger this vulnerability In admin/edit_group.php, when thePOST parameter action is “Delete”, the POST parameter delete_group leads toa SQL injection.

criterions.comment: phpgacl package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
